item.title: Skate 3
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Skate 3 — видеоигра, симулятор скейтбординга, разработанный EA Black Box и выпущенный Electronic Arts для консолей Xbox 360 и PlayStation 3 в мае 2010 года. Третья и последняя игра в одноименной серии, сиквел игры Skate 2.
item.content:encoded: Skate 3 — видеоигра, симулятор скейтбординга, разработанный EA Black Box и выпущенный Electronic Arts для консолей Xbox 360 и PlayStation 3 в мае 2010 года. Третья и последняя игра в одноименной серии, сиквел игры Skate 2.

item.title: The Simpsons: Tapped Out
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: The Simpsons: Tapped Out is a free-to-play game for iOS and Android operating systems based on the American animated series The Simpsons.
item.content:encoded: The Simpsons: Tapped Out is a free-to-play game for iOS and Android operating systems based on the American animated series The Simpsons.

item.title: The Sims 4
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: The Sims 4 is a single-player life simulation sandbox video game, the fourth in the The Sims series, developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts for Windows and macOS.
item.content:encoded: The Sims 4 is a single-player life simulation sandbox video game, the fourth in the The Sims series, developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts for Windows and macOS.
